pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:5.1: 32. The training rule on lying down on the same sheet
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:6.2: At that time two nuns were lying down on the same sheet and under the same cover.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:6.3: When people who were walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:6.4: “How can two nuns lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover? They are just like lay people who indulge in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:7.1: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:7.3: “How can two nuns lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:7.7: How can two nuns lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:8.1: ‘If two nuns lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover, they commit an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:9.4: fully ordained is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:10.1: If two […] lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:10.2: if they spread out just the one and cover themselves with just the one, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:11.2: If it is the same sheet and the same cover, and they perceive them as such, and they lie down, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:11.3: If it is the same sheet and the same cover, but they are unsure of it, and they lie down, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:11.4: If it is the same sheet and the same cover, but they do not perceive them as such, and they lie down, they commit an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:12.1: If it is the same sheet but different covers, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:12.2: If it is different sheets but the same cover, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:12.3: If it is different sheets and different covers, but they perceive them as the same, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:12.4: If it is different sheets and different covers, but they are unsure of it, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:12.5: If it is different sheets and different covers, and they perceive them as such, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:13.4: if they are the first offenders.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:14.1: The second training rule is finished.
